segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like this is completely normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just as careless as he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on those cookies that he’s not thinking about anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will even react if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
